src:
Aji Santoso Kepincut Tiga Pemain Muda Persebaya
01 Nov 2019, 21:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso kepincut dengan tiga pemain muda Persebaya yang ikut dalam latihan. Tiga pemain yang dimaksud adalah Zulfikar Akhmad, Koko Ari Araya, dan Muhammad Kemaluddin.
Bahkan Aji berjanji akan memberikan kesempatan ketiganya untuk bermain. Namun, mereka harus sudah siap secara mental untuk bisa tampil di kompetisi Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang disiarkan Indosiar.
"Ada tiga pemain yang menurut saya memiliki prospek sepak bola cukup bagus, saya senang, saya suka pemain muda," kata Aji Santoso, Jumat (01/11/2019).
"Saya bilang pada mereka, asalkan kamu siap mental, taktikal, pasti nanti akan saya berikan kesempatan. Meskipun tidak dalam waktu dekat ini," sambungnya.
Zulfikar Akhmad dan kawan-kawan sebenarnya sudah mengikuti latihan Persebaya sejak era kepelatihan Djadjang Nurdjaman. Bahkan, di antara mereka sudah pernah mendapat kesempatan bermain.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Aji Santoso was attracted to three Persebaya young players
Nov 01 2019, 21:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya coach, Aji Santoso was attracted by three young Persebaya players who took part in the training. The three players in question are Zulfikar Akhmad, Koko Ari Araya, and Muhammad Kemaluddin.
Even Aji promised to give the third chance to play. However, they must be mentally ready to be able to appear in the 2019 Shopee League competition broadcast by Indosiar.
"There are three players who in my opinion have good football prospects, I'm happy, I like young players," said Aji Santoso, Friday (01/11/2019).
"I told them, as long as you are ready mentally, tactically, surely I will give you a chance. Although not in the near future," he continued.
Zulfikar Akhmad and his friends have actually participated in the Persebaya training since Djadjang Nurdjaman's training era. In fact, among them have had the opportunity to play.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
